channel.title: The X-Files on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The X-Files on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Chris Willingham, Film Editor on ’24,’ ‘The X-Files,’ ‘Grimm,’ Dies at 74
item.description: The 1980s TV hit ‘B.J. and the Bear’ was his first editing gig, and he cut an episode of ‘Yellowstone’ in 2019.
